channel.title: Dragon claws spec
channel.description: Alright so I made my dragon claws have special attack and when I do the special my player does the emote and gfx but doesnt hit anything with the special? i need help how do i make it hit the 4 times that it usually does and whn i do the special it doesnt use any of the special bar

item.title: Dragon claws spec
item.dc:creator: @BubbleScape_x BubbleScape x
item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

Special.java for the bar to appear, i think. here: This is a code for whip special, edit it up.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ AttackingOn2.specGFX(341); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(341); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; }

Read full topic
